page.title: 15Clubs, Swainby & Potto
page.content: Swainby & Potto{Women's Institute}with 50 members and{Mothers' Union}with 30 meet monthly. The Methodist{Women's} {Fellowship}meets fortnightly during the winter.{Senior citizens}have a 55 Club on Thursdays and whist on Mondays. A{Lecture Society}meets on the first Wednesday monthly. A{Pram} {Group}caters for mothers with small children. There are{Cubs, Scouts,} {Guides}and a{Youth Fellowship}loosely attached to the Church. All these meet in the Church Hall or Village Hall. A {Handbell Group}and{Church Bellringers practise weekly,{cricket and football} clubs play in season, and the public houses have their{darts}teams in a local league. There are{support groups for Cheshire Homes, NSPCC, Blind Guild and Conservatives, which all hold fund-raising events. Potto people join with Swainby for most events.
